Judy & Punch

Ano: 2019

IMDb ID: tt7798644

Sinopse: Seaside (nowhere near the sea), puppeteers Judy and Punch are trying to resurrect their marionette show on the brink of an anarchic mob rule. When Punch accidentally kills their baby during a drinking binge, his wife Judy, having suffered a violent beating, teams up with a band of outcast heretics to enact revenge on Punch and the entire town.
